ResearchProjectDef.label: crystalline reconfiguration
ResearchProjectDef.description: Crystal can be manipulated to take other shapes, greatly expanding its uses.

ResearchProjectDef.label: psionic energy tapping
ResearchProjectDef.description: Latent psionic fields can be tapped for electrical energy.

ResearchProjectDef.label: shard weaponry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Crystalline shard launchers can be crafted to shred unarmored targets.

ResearchProjectDef.label: crystalline weaving
ResearchProjectDef.description: Drawing out crystal into thin strands allows it to be woven into clothing.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ekrian designs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Ekrian designs, involving the use of Ekrian shards, are used for high end Crystalloid devices and weaponry.

ResearchProjectDef.label: psionic weaponry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Psionic weapons deal burning damage, which interacts with armor in a different way than bullets do.

ResearchProjectDef.label: construct basics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Simple prism constructs can be fabricated and directed by a construct hub to help defend the colony.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced construct design
ResearchProjectDef.description: Preserver constructs can be deployed to bring much more firepower than prisms.

ResearchProjectDef.label: anima mutation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Crystalline flesh samples can be psionically directed to mutate into Anima Prisms, living crystalline constructs that produce usable crystal. Crystalloids can be used for this purpose, and the implications that their primary resource has roots to their own biology is something most humans find unsettling.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ekrian shard synthesis
ResearchProjectDef.description: Ekrian shards can be manufactured at a fabrication bench. However, the process is slow and wastes much of the crystal used in the process.
